title: Chapter 3124: The Divine Power Origin Bead
body:
Chapter 3124: The Divine Power Origin Bead

Chapter 3124: The divine power origin bead

The aura in the sky continued to spread out, as if an extremely terrifying beast was about to appear.

Then, a figure appeared in the sky.

This figure was shrouded in divine light, and his appearance couldn’t be seen clearly. However, he gave off an extremely imposing feeling.

All the aura was coming from this person.

“Heavenly King, it’s the Heavenly King!”

The paragons of the nine blades Heavenly King mansion were ecstatic.

“Heavenly King, it’s the nine blade Heavenly King!”

The hearts of the people at the scene trembled.

This person was the Heavenly King Nine sabers.

.com

The nine blade Heavenly King had personally made a move.

“Nine blades, what are you doing? Attacking my people in my territory? Do you really think I’m easy to talk to?”

At this moment, a voice suddenly sounded.

This voice came from an unknown direction, but it suddenly spread in all directions.

As the voice rang out, a mysterious aura also filled the air.

The terrifying aura of the nine blade Heavenly King was immediately dispelled by this aura.

The pressure on Lu Ming, jiujue mu, and the rest was relieved. They heaved a long sigh of relief.

They felt that their entire bodies were drenched in cold sweat. Facing the nine saber Heavenly King, the pressure they felt was too great, as if they were about to face a disaster at any time.

This feeling was really uncomfortable.

“Divine Lord!”

Lu Ming clenched his fists tightly. Once again, he felt the power of a divine Lord. In front of such an expert, he could not even put up a slight resistance.

In fact, he could not even muster up the thought of resisting. The gap was too big.

“Father!”

The third Prince exclaimed in surprise.

it’s Heavenly King Nine cuts!

Many people were shocked.

A moment later, the space above everyone’s head began to ripple, and then a figure appeared.

Lu Ming recognized the figure at a glance. It was the nine absolutes Heavenly King.

Lu Ming was a little speechless. He did not expect that he would attract the two big shots, nine absolutes Heavenly King and nine blades Heavenly King, when he was just fighting with a few geniuses of the residence of the nine blades.

The two Heavenly Kings were important figures even in the great void sacred dynasty.

“Nine seals!”

The nine saber Heavenly King muttered, and his eyes shone with a dazzling light. A terrifying aura rushed towards the nine absolutes Heavenly King.

Heavenly King Nine cuts also let out an aura.

BOOM!

The two auras collided, and the space shook violently. It was as if the entire starry sky was shaking violently.

The most shocking thing was still everyone’s hearts.

Many people were looking forward to it, but they were also nervous.

With the two Heavenly Kings, a great battle was going to break out today.

The battle between the Heavenly Kings would definitely be earth-shattering and devastating.

“Nine blades, what do you want to do in my nine absolute Heavenly King mansion? If you really want to start a war with me, then let’s fight!”

Heavenly King Nine absolutes’s voice resounded throughout the entire area.

“Jiujue, why are you so nervous?”

The nine blade Heavenly King grinned. The aura on his body was quickly retracted, becoming like a stone without a trace of aura leaking out.

At the same time, the divine light on his body also disappeared, revealing his true appearance.

It was a middle-aged man with a square face. His face was as sharp as a knife. When he opened his eyes, there seemed to be a terrifying knife light shooting out.

This was the nine blade Heavenly King.

“Nine blades, what are you trying to do?”

Heavenly King Nine cuts asked again.

Heavenly King Nine sabers ‘strength was unfathomable. If they really fought, he was not sure if he would win. And in the nine absolute Heavenly King mansion, other than him, no one else was a match for the nine saber Heavenly King mansion.

Therefore, the other party dared to bring people to the nine absolute Heavenly King Manor.

the reason why I brought my men here is simple. The grand opening of the great void Royal sacred Academy is approaching. Wouldn’t it be great to bring these heaven’s favorites here and let them spar with each other? ”

The nine blade Heavenly King smiled.

“Furthermore, I’ve prepared a huge gift for you!”

The nine blade Heavenly King added.

“A big gift? What big gift?”

The nine absolute Heavenly King said. The nine sabers Heavenly King would bring a big gift? He seriously doubted it.

“Everyone, please take a look!”

The nine blade Heavenly King smiled, and his palm glowed. A round bead that was as black as ink and kept spinning appeared in his hand.

Everyone’s eyes naturally fell on the bead.

“What is this?”

Many people were stunned.

However, a small number of people’s pupils contracted as if they had thought of something.

“This … Could this be the legendary divine power origin bead?”

An old man exclaimed, his voice trembling.

“What? A divine power origin bead? It’s impossible!”

“How could the nine blade Heavenly King be willing to take out the divine power Pearl?”

The scene was in a state of chaos. It was simply unbelievable.

Those who had awakened the origin divine power factor might be able to awaken origin secret techniques from the origin divine power factor.

This secret technique was hidden in the factor of divine power. It was a secret technique that the primitive gods had controlled.

This kind of secret skill was mysterious and unpredictable. Its power was terrifying, and it could be used with one’s heart. It could accompany a person for a lifetime and was priceless.

However, the chances of awakening were extremely low, so low that it was shocking.

And there were no rules, it was purely based on individual talent.

Some people could awaken the origin secret skill after the first awakening of the origin divine power factor. Some people could only comprehend the origin secret skill after two awakenings. Some people could awaken the origin secret skill for the third time.

Moreover, out of 10000 people who had awakened the origin divine power factor, there might not be one who could awaken the origin secret skill.

It was too difficult!

However, there were all sorts of strange things in the world, and there would always be all kinds of wonderful treasures.

The divine power Pearl was a Supreme treasure that could help people comprehend the origin secret technique of the divine power factor. The success rate was as high as 90%.

This was almost equivalent to obtaining a divine power Pearl and comprehending an origin secret skill.

This value was too precious. It was especially attractive to the geniuses who wanted to dominate the younger generation.

However, there were too few divine power origin beads. It was not something that could be obtained just because one’s cultivation was high or status was high. It required luck and luck.

He had not expected that the nine blade Heavenly King would have a divine power Pearl.

Many people’s eyes were burning with desire. If it were not for the fact that the divine power origin Pearl was in the hands of the nine blade Heavenly King, the others would have fired.

Heavenly King Nine absolutes was also shocked, ” “Nine blades, what’s your purpose in taking out the divine power Pearl?”

it’s very simple. I plan to hold an event for the paragons of the nine saber Heavenly King mansion and the nine absolute Heavenly King mansion to compete. The divine power origin Pearl will belong to whoever can get it. No one else is allowed to snatch it!

Heavenly King Nine blades said.

Everyone was shocked by his words.

The nine blade Heavenly King wanted to take out the divine power Pearl and let the younger generation fight for it. Whoever got it would get it.

Even the heaven’s favorites from the nine blades Heavenly King mansion were surprised.

The paragons from both sides of the nine sabers Heavenly King mansion and the nine absolute Heavenly King mansion had a fiery glow in their eyes.

The eyes of those geniuses who had awakened the origin divine power factor burned with passion.
